mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (account_num, customer_id, name, account_password, account_money, open_date, bank_code) VALUES (#{account_num}, #{customer_id}, #{name}, #{account_password}, #{account_money}, #{open_date}, #{bank_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET customer_id = #{customer_id}, name = #{name}, account_password = #{account_password}, account_money = #{account_money}, open_date = #{open_date}, bank_code = #{bank_code} WHERE account_num = #{account_num}
